shortcuts: BlackBox.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Black Box - Find the hidden balls in the box by bouncing laser beams off them
Bridges.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Bridges - Connect all the islands with a network of bridges
Cube.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Cube - Pick up all the blue squares by rolling the cube over them
Dominosa.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Dominos - Tile the rectangle with a full set of dominoes
Fifteen.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Fifteen - Slide the tiles around to arrange them into order
Filling.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Filling - Mark every square with the area of its containing region
Flip.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Flip - Flip groups of squares to light them all up at once
Flood.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Flood - Turn the grid the same colour in as few flood fills as possible
Galaxies.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Galaxies - Divide the grid into rotationally symmetric regions each centred on a dot
Guess.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Guess - Guess the hidden combination of colours
Inertia.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Inertia - Collect all the gems without running into any of the mines
Keen.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Keen - Complete the latin square in accordance with the arithmetic clues
LightUp.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Light Up - Place bulbs to light up all the squares
Loopy.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Loopy - Draw a single closed loop, given clues about number of adjacent edges
Magnets.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Magnets - Place magnets to satisfy the clues and avoid like poles touching
Map.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Map - Colour the map so that adjacent regions are never the same colour
Mines.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Mines - Find all the mines without treading on any of them
Mosaic.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Mosaic - Fill in the grid given clues about number of nearby black squares
NetGame.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Net - each tile to reassemble the network
Netslide.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Netslide - Slide a row at a time to reassemble the network
Palisade.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Palisade - Divide the grid into equal-sized areas in accordance with the clues
Pattern.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Pattern - the pattern in the grid, given only the lengths of runs of black squares
Pearl.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Pearl - Draw a single closed loop, given clues about corner and straight squares
Pegs.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Pegs - pegs over each other to remove all but one
Range.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Range - Place black squares to limit the visible distance from each numbered cell
Rect.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Rectangles - grid into rectangles with areas equal to the numbers
SameGame.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Same Game - Clear the grid by removing touching groups of the same colour squares
Signpost.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Signpost - Connect the squares into a path following the arrows
Singles.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Singles - Black out the right set of duplicate numbers
Sixteen.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Sixteen - Slide a row at a time to arrange the tiles into order
Slant.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Slant - Draw a maze of slanting lines that matches the clues
Solo.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Solo - Fill in the grid so that each row, column and square block contains one of every digit
Tents.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Tents - Place a tent next to each tree
Towers.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Towers - Complete the latin square of towers in accordance with the clues
Tracks.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Tracks - Fill in the railway track according to the clues
Twiddle.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Twiddle - Rotate the tiles around themselves to arrange them into order
Undead.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Undead - Place ghosts, vampires and zombies so that the right numbers of them can be seen in mirrors
Unequal.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Unequal - the latin square in accordance with the > signs
Unruly.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Unruly - Fill in the black and white grid to avoid runs of three
Untangle.exe
Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection\Untangle - Reposition the points so that the lines do not cross
notes: Settings are saved in $env:AppData/Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection
